Class lajax\translatemanager\models\searches\LanguageSearch

All Classes | Methods | Constants
Inheritancelajax\translatemanager\models\searches\LanguageSearch » lajax\translatemanager\models\Language » yii\db\ActiveRecord

LanguageSearch represents the model behind the search form about common\models\Language.
